long_description: With its fun, feminine style and travel-ready fabric, the Lole Odette Dress easily goes from sightseeing to a sit-down dinner. Put it at the top of your packing list for all upcoming adventures.
short_description: With its fun, feminine style and travel-ready fabric, the Lole Odette Dress easily goes from sightseeing to a sit-down dinner. Put it at the top of your packing list for all upcoming adventures.
